page.title: 01THE BIC (1)
page.content:
The Bournemouth International Centre BIC was opened in September 1984 to house the increasing number of visitors and to keep Bournemouth one of the biggest and best conference towns in Britain.
It is used by people of all ages with several bars and resturants and several cafes. It has two large halls.
The Windsor Hall which houses over four thousand people. This is used for major pop concerts by such stars as Wham. This is also the main conference hall where the major political parties, institutes and unions hold thier Annual Conferences.
Sarah Haley
